name: ActiveWorlds Custom Avatar File
summary: Learn about .AWCAV files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: To create a custom avatar, select Avatar â†’ Custom Avatar from the application menu and then choose the "Show CAV window" button from the top application window bar. Next, select your avatar options and then click the Save Preset button. To load a custom avatar, select the Load Preset button.
